name: express-prism
description: Express-Prisma Boilerplate is a robust and efficient starter project for building web applications. It combines the simplicity and performance of Express.js, a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework, with the power of Prisma, an open-source database toolkit. Express.js provides a thin layer of fundamental web application features, while Prisma simplifies database access, migration, and management. This boilerplate includes a pre-configured setup with sensible defaults and best practices, perfect for building scalable, reliable, and maintainable production-ready server-side applications.
